messages.text: Lufthansa Group Inspirational AI flight assistant. Nice to meet you!
I want to fly somewhere in December where it's warm
Could you please specify your origin location and any preferred destination cities where you'd like to fly in December?
starting from zurich, don't know where
Could you specify if you have any preferred warm destinations or if you'd like me to check the climate for any of the listed destinations?
Could you specify if you have any preferred warm destinations or if you'd like me to check the climate for any of the listed destinations?

It seems there was a mix-up in the search results. To find warm destinations in December from Zurich, could you please specify if you have any preferred warm destinations or if you'd like me to check the climate
Here are some warm destinations you might consider for a trip in December, departing from Zurich:
Africa sounds interesting, how much does it cost?

I'm glad you're interested in Africa! To give you a more accurate cost estimate, could you please specify the destination city in Africa you're interested in, the number of travelers, your preferred class of
